column2: §MAll players will be notified of this change!§!
Invasions are now DISABLED for all human players.
Invasions are now ENABLED for all human players (who have access to an Invasion CB).

Invasions are now MANAGED INDIVIDUALLY for all human players (who have access to an Invasion CB).\nThe host can decide which players are permitted to use Invasion CBs, and where those Invasion CBs can be used.
